com.plugin.component.extension.module

类 Digraph<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plugin.component.extension.module.Digraph<V>

  • public class Digraph<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    An example class for directed graphs. The vertex type can be specified. There are no edge costs/weights.

    Written for CS211, Nov 2006.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Digraph() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(V vertex)
      Add a vertex to the dependencyGraph.
      void add(V from, V to)
      Add an edge to the dependencyGraph; if either vertex does not exist, it's added.
      java.util.Map bfsDistance(V start)
      Report (as a Map) the bfs distance to each vertex from the start vertex.
      boolean contains(V vertex)
      True iff dependencyGraph contains vertex.
      java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> inDegree()
      Report (as a Map) the in-degree of each vertex.
      boolean isDag()
      True iff dependencyGraph is a dag (directed acyclic dependencyGraph).
      java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> outDegree()
      Report (as a Map) the out-degree of each vertex.
      void remove(V from, V to)
      Remove an edge from the dependencyGraph.
      java.util.List<V> topSort()
      Report (as a List) the topological sort of the vertices; null for no such sort.
      java.lang.String toString()
      String representation of dependencyGraph.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Digraph

        public Digraph()

    • 方法详细资料

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation of dependencyGraph.
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • add

        public void add(V vertex)
        Add a vertex to the dependencyGraph. Nothing happens if vertex is already in dependencyGraph.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(V vertex)
        True iff dependencyGraph contains vertex.

      • add

        public void add(V from,
                V to)
        Add an edge to the dependencyGraph; if either vertex does not exist, it's added. This implementation allows the creation of multi-edges and self-loops.

      • remove

        public void remove(V from,
                   V to)
        Remove an edge from the dependencyGraph. Nothing happens if no such edge.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either vertex doesn't exist.

      • outDegree

        public java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> outDegree()
        Report (as a Map) the out-degree of each vertex.

      • inDegree

        public java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> inDegree()
        Report (as a Map) the in-degree of each vertex.

      • topSort

        public java.util.List<V> topSort()
        Report (as a List) the topological sort of the vertices; null for no such sort.

      • isDag

        public boolean isDag()
        True iff dependencyGraph is a dag (directed acyclic dependencyGraph).

      • bfsDistance

        public java.util.Map bfsDistance(V start)
        Report (as a Map) the bfs distance to each vertex from the start vertex. The distance is an Integer; the value null is used to represent infinity (implying that the corresponding node cannot be reached).
